```typescript

```

### <span class="badge object-method"></span> type

Possible enum values:

 - `"random"` 

 - `"random edges"` 

 - `"response_medium"` 

 - `"response_small"` 

 - `"feature_showcase"` 

```typescript
type(type: "random" | "random edges" | "response_medium" | "response_small" | "feature_showcase")
```
